title: New: Grapell – Shaping My Love
body:
Photo: [Adina Triumf](https://www.

facebook.com/adina.triumf) Well over a year since Stockholm duo **Grapell** cropped up with their intriguing debut EP, and they’re now back with a far more coherent and focused sound. _Shaping My Love_ ditches the Radiohead fascination that clung to their first release, and finds them sliding through a range of soul and R&B influences. Yet again marking them out as one of the most exciting Swedish acts around at this moment in time, it’ll be interesting to see where their forthcoming EP takes them.
